name: Ping Blast (brobot9000)
description:
This microgame is what I like to call an aggressive Pong-like. Two dots, one field, and a whole lot of pinging and blasting.

Your goal is to eliminate as many targets as possible before you are destroyed. Shoot enemy bullets to increase your modifier and snag powerups to waste your opponent.

But be warned, your opponent is watching your moves closely, and you may find them mirroring you into a deadly corner.
